item.title: It looks like a broken trampoline, 21st July
item.description:

item.title: Barriers propped against fence, 21st July
item.description:
A whole bunch of barriers have been propped against a garden fence. Looked like they come of a van that's parked on Kent house rd opposite 107/109 but can't say for sure. Very unsafe as not secured.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Kent House Road, New Beckenham, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Tree pruning needed, 21st July
item.description:
This tree is a council tree outside our house. It has never been lopped or pruned in 20 plus years and now feels it could come down in high winds. Large branches come off it and could damage vehicles or even passers-by. I don't want it cut down, just pruned in the autumn to keep it's shape.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 553, Footscray Road, New Eltham, Sidcup, London
Report on FixMyStreet
